mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_no AS goodsNo , g.goods_title AS goodTitle , g.goods_price AS goodsPrice , c.cart_amount AS cartAmount , Round(c.cart_amount * g.goods_price, -1) AS totalPrice FROM cart c INNER JOIN goods g ON c.goods_no = g.goods_no WHERE c.customer_email = #{customerEmail}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE customer_email = #{customerEamil} AND cart_no = #{cartNo};
